SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.percussion.workflow.mail
Interface IPSMailMessageContext

public interface IPSMailMessageContext

This interface defines methods to access the mail message related data. The sendMessage method of the IPSMailProgram interface gets this read only object so that the plugin for custom mail program can access the data and send the message.

Method Summary
 String getBody()
          Returns the body of the mail message as defined in the workflow definition.
 String getCc()
          Returns the comma separated list of all users (roles) that need to receive a copy of the the message.
 String getFrom()
          Returns the name of the user or role that is sending the workflow notification.
 String getMailDomain()
          Returns the mail domain of the user as registered in the workflow properties file for the variable MAIL_DOMAIN (with the syntax @percussion.com).
 String getSmtpHost()
          Returns the SMTP host name as registered in the workflow properties file for the variable SMTP_HOST (in the syntax ne.mediaone.net).
 String getSubject()
          Returns the subject of the mail message as defined in the workflow definition.
 String getTo()
          Returns the comma separated list of all users or roles that need to receive the message as per the workflow definition.
 String getURL()
          Returns the URL to access the current content item in the workflow defined in the workflow definition.
 

Method Detail

getFrom

String getFrom()
Returns the name of the user or role that is sending the workflow notification.

Returns:
sender's name as String, may be null or empty.

getTo

String getTo()
Returns the comma separated list of all users or roles that need to receive the message as per the workflow definition.

Returns:
comma separated list of user or role names as String, Shall never be null or empty.

getCc

String getCc()
Returns the comma separated list of all users (roles) that need to receive a copy of the the message. Meant for future use.

Returns:
comma separated list of user or role names as String, can be null or empty.

getSubject

String getSubject()
Returns the subject of the mail message as defined in the workflow definition.

Returns:
subject of mail message as String, can be null or empty.

getBody

String getBody()
Returns the body of the mail message as defined in the workflow definition.

Returns:
Body of the message as String, can be null or empty.

getURL

String getURL()
Returns the URL to access the current content item in the workflow defined in the workflow definition. This is normally appended to the message body.

Returns:
URL of the current content item as String, can be null or empty.

getMailDomain

String getMailDomain()
Returns the mail domain of the user as registered in the workflow properties file for the variable MAIL_DOMAIN (with the syntax @percussion.com). The sender or recipients' names normally need to appended with the domain name while sending mail notification.

Returns:
mail domain, can be null or empty.

getSmtpHost

String getSmtpHost()
Returns the SMTP host name as registered in the workflow properties file for the variable SMTP_HOST (in the syntax ne.mediaone.net).

Returns:
smtp HOST NAME, can be null or empty.
